description: This project detects fraudulent transactions in a fintech dataset, using ensemble ML for anomaly detection. Align with operational risk frameworks. Use a credit card fraud dataset from Kaggle.

A fast, distributed, high performance gradient boosting (GBT, GBDT, GBRT, GBM or MART) framework based on decision tree algorithms, used for ranking, classification and many other machine learning tasks.

A robust machine learning framework to detect spear-phishing emails using NLP, XGBoost, and TensorFlow. Includes explainability (SHAP/LIME), real-time prediction (FastAPI), monitoring (Prometheus + Grafana), and async feedback handling (Redis). Designed for scalability, transparency, and production-readiness.

Curated machine learning and AI roadmapfree, open-access resources spanning foundational math, tutorials, books, frameworks, LLMs, interactive demos, and EdTech tools. Start anywhere, level up everywhere.
The PennyLane-Qulacs plugin integrates the Qulacs quantum computing framework with PennyLane's quantum machine learning capabilities.

A Java-based Personality Detection System using the Tribuo ML framework. Trains and compares Logistic Regression, Random Forest, and XGBoost models to predict personality traits from behavioral data, deploying the best-performing model for accurate predictions.

RESTful API for vector similarity search. It uses the Python web framework FastAPI and a REDIS vector database.  This accelerates machine learning workflows that require vector similarity search using classification models.
Practical Machine Learning Framework for Designing and Predicting C-Amidated Antimicrobial Peptides
This repository contains a simple To-Do app made with a Next.js framework and a FastAPI connection to a Machine Learning model, made in preparation for the Junction 2025 hackathon.
A collection of hands-on machine learning and deep learning projects, including image classification, text classification, and summarization with modern frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, HuggingFace)
Machine learning-based classification framework for detecting spatially extended and diffuse emission in the high redshift universe, using multi-band broadband imaging.

A full-featured MLOps framework built on Google Cloud Platform. This repository implements an end-to-end machine learning lifecycle with automated training, deployment, monitoring, and human-in-the-loop feedback.
Machine Learning-based framework for redshift estimation and cosmological parameter inference using Gamma-Ray Bursts as potential standard candles.

Quantum + Edge Computing Playground A simulation framework exploring how edge devices (IoT, drones, traffic lights, wearables) can collaborate with quantum backends for optimization, security, and machine learning.

Ce dpt GitHub offre des exercices varis couvrant l'analyse d'algorithmes, le deep learning, le machine learning, le NLP, et des frameworks tels que PyTorch, TensorFlow, et Spark. Des exercices sur les systmes de recommandations sont aussi disponibles.
code and dates

A comprehensive dataset and analysis framework for urban sound classification. Includes diverse real-world audio samples, preprocessing pipelines, feature extraction, and support for training machine learning models for environmental sound recognition.

This project presents SecureScan, a hybrid framework for secure QR code scanning that integrates traditional URL validation, blacklist detection, and machine learning-based malicious URL analysis. The system ensures protection against phishing, malicious websites, and security vulnerabilities. Developed as a Final Year Project 2025.
A machine learning frame work to predict target-specific peptide inhibitor of insect Voltage-gated Sodium Channels (VGSC))

A collection of neural network components implemented from scratch using only NumPy. This project focuses on deepening the understanding of machine learning theory by building everything manually without high-level frameworks.

Research platform for three-state logic systems in machine learning, with applications to GANs, uncertainty quantification, and robust AI. Features interactive CLI, web API, and comprehensive analysis tools.Lots of analysis and work on which to engage via robust forks.
Geospatial Machine Learning Framework for Maritime Anomaly Detection and Illegal Fishing Prevention

Official code for a Ph.D. thesis predicting urban growth in Lucknow. This project develops a novel hybrid intelligence framework that integrates machine learning with Explainable AI (SHAP). It resolves the "black box" problem to create a transparent, reproducible, and highly accurate model for sustainable urban planning.

This project implements a Cat vs Not Cat classifier using logistic regression from scratch in NumPy. Instead of relying on libraries like scikit-learn, I coded the cost function, gradient descent, and prediction manually. This demonstrates how machine learning actually works under the hood, before moving to high-level frameworks.
Smart IoT Framework for Climate Responsive Moringa Cultivation And Fertilizer Optimization Using Machine Learning.
A generalised framework for property-driven machine learning, combining input region specification via hyper-rectangles with differentiable logics to compile logical constraints into loss.

A PyTorch-based framework for Quantum Classical Simulation, Quantum Machine Learning, Quantum Neural Networks, Parameterized Quantum Circuits with support for easy deployments on real quantum computers.
Algorithmic Trading in Python with Machine Learning

This repo contains machine learning and deep learning models for various problems, using frameworks like scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and PyTorch. It includes ML algorithms, neural networks, and notebooks demonstrating data preprocessing, model training, and evaluation.

Interpretable machine learning framework for thyroid disease diagnosis using ensemble stacking and feature selection methods. Incorporates SHAP and LIME to ensure model transparency and explainability.

MPMR-IMCP is a two-stage AI framework. It first uses a Vision Transformer to identify mucin expression from H&E whole slide images, then applies machine learning to integrate image features and clinical data for predicting intestinal metaplasia cancer risk.
Autonomous Trading Propagator orchestrates Machine Learning Model Integration across a Distributed Risk Governance Framework, ensuring Scalable Intelligent Optimization.

An open, machine-learningdriven computational framework that automatically extracts and quantifies atomic-scale dynamics from electron microscopy and atomistic simulations to reveal how catalysts evolve under working conditions.
Interactive learning experiences are enabled through intelligent PygameTutorials, leveraging frameworks and seamless machine learning integration for optimized deployment.

This is Laptop Shopping Mart website,write with Django Framework and  HTML,CSS,JavaScript,Json,Python API.The project has machine learning recommendation system and transformer Gradio hugging face AI chatbot and paypal and stripe payment.
A Rust powered PyTorch-like Machine Learning framework.

A fast, distributed, high performance gradient boosting (GBT, GBDT, GBRT, GBM or MART) framework based on decision tree algorithms, used for ranking, classification and many other machine learning tasks.
A pure Rust implementation of TensorFlow, providing a full-featured machine learning framework with Rust's safety and performance.

This project is a web application that predicts rent based on property size, number of bedrooms, age, and zip code. The backend uses Python's Flask framework and a machine learning model (linear regression), while the frontend is built with responsive HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Heart Hybrid Classifier is a machine learning framework focused on cardiovascular risk prediction. The goal is to evaluate accuracy and interpretability of the models in a clinical setting.

Banks face frequent loan defaults, demanding robust risk management. This study builds a machine learning framework to predict credit defaults using structured financial data. It includes data preprocessing, model building, and fairness evaluation to ensure predictions are both accurate and socially equitable.
Keep track of the newest machine learning frameworks on GitHub
PsyPredict is a machine learning-powered framework designed to assist in the predictive modeling and classification of mental health conditions.
Hyper-personalized content orchestrator utilizing real-time processing, scalable machine learning, and distributed content recommendation frameworks for adaptive scheduler.
A rust powered machine learning framework for python

Artificial intelligence and machine learning landscape evolves, there are many tools and frameworks available for developers. Among these, Mediapipe stands out as a comprehensive solution for various computer vision tasks, including human pose estimation
Comprehensive tennis analytics and machine learning framework to quantify player performance, match dynamics, and tour-level insights.

BRCATranstypia: A machine learning framework for breast cancer PAM50 subtype prediction using TCGA-BRCA transcriptomic data. It integrates preprocessing, feature selection, model training (Random Forest, SVM, XGBoost), and visualization of gene expression patterns.
Hyrax - A framework for machine learning in astronomy
Interactive machine learning demos with TensorFlow.js featuring linear regression and binary classification with Materialize CSS framework
an open-sourced highly automated machine learning Python framework for data-driven geochemistry discovery

Flask is a lightweight, open-source Python web framework used in Data Science to deploy and manage data-driven applications. It offers a simple yet powerful structure for creating web apps and APIs that integrate with data analysis or machine learning models, providing flexibility for custom solutions.

Monocle  a modular framework for Computer Vision and Machine Learning pipelines. It unifies models, filters, and postprocessors through typed data contracts, enabling composable inference graphs, plugin extensions, and seamless integration across CV, OCR, LLM, and API systems.

Master's thesis codebase for evaluation of fusion strategies in clinical depression screening. Multimodal depression detection framework using Text, Audio, and Video modalities with Early and Late Fusion strategies. Implements Logistic Regression and XGBoost classifiers on E-DAIC dataset with SHAP and coefficient-based methods.

A comprehensive checkpoint management and experiment tracking system for machine learning models. Intelligent model checkpointing with automated experiment tracking, performance analytics, and training resumption. Built for production ML workflows with support    for PyTorch, TensorFlow, JAX, and custom model frameworks.
A topological machine learning framework based on PyTorch

ME-FLEET is a Multi-Exit Federated Learning framework for real-time fleet-based anomaly detection, integrating EdgeFogCloud collaboration to enable scalable, privacy-preserving, and interpretable condition monitoring across distributed machines.
Machine Learning based framework for estimation of Effective Population Size(Ne) from genetic summary statistics
Evolving TokenIncubator harnesses AI-driven Machine Learning Integration for intelligent, processing within a highly scalable Distributed Smart Contract Framework.
A systematic investigation into the reproducibility of machine learning research papers by creating standardized benchmarks and validation frameworks.
Discover key research papers on Quantum Machine Learning (QML) and explore transfer learning frameworks, applications, and optimization strategies.

Automated multi-engine framework for unpacking, analyzing, and devirtualizing binaries protected by commercial and custom Virtual Machine based protectors. Combines Dynamic Taint Tracking, Symbolic Execution, Pattern & Semantic Classification, and Machine Learningdriven prioritization to dramatically reduce manual reverse engineering time.
A curated list of awesome machine learning frameworks, libraries and software (by language). I
A comprehensive benchmarking framework for evaluating and comparing multiple machine learning models on credit card fraud detection

A machine learning framework for simulating and predicting random walks. Includes parameterized bias sampling, enhanced feature engineering, multi-dimensional support, and real-world applications such as financial markets, IoT sensor drift, healthcare monitoring, and cybersecurity.
An ensemble Framework for Explainable Geospatial Analysis Machine Learning Models
Matlab code for the in silico Belousov-Zhabotinsky reaction in the paper "Machine Learning-enabled experiment-driven cartography of complex chemical spaces"
ytopt: machine-learning-based autotuning and hyperparameter optimization framework using Bayesian Optimization
This repo contain the jupyter scripts for  files of scikitlearn, tensorflow and keras
A Julia machine learning framework

Kolmo is a project that combines physics informed machine learning, statistical learning, sensor fusion and stochastic analysis to provide a robust framework for real-time modelling of dynamical systems under uncertainty

The main focus is to understand how frameworks work under the hood. The Library is a Data Science and Machine Learning library for C, providing essential tools for data processing, statistical analysis, and model building.

A collection of my data science and AI projects built with Python, R, and modern frameworks. Focused on machine learning, NLP, optimization, and analytics dashboards each project blends technical depth with real-world insight, clear documentation, and reproducible workflows.

Perovskite solar cells (PSCs) have achieved outstanding efficiencies, but their instability under real-world conditions limits large-scale use. This study introduces a machine learningbased framework integrating surrogate modeling and multi-objective optimization to improve both efficiency and stability.
A web framework for cervical cancer detection using machine learning

PanARGMiner: Pan-genomic Antimicrobial Resistance Gene Miner is a machine learning framework for selecting key antimicrobial resistance features from large-scale genomic data with high accuracy and interpretability.
This repository contains the data-driven framework and machine learning models for the design and optimization of Cr/NNN catalysts for ethylene oligomerization.

SPARK is a extensible energy analytics platform designed for processing large-scale renewable energy datasets using the Hadoop MapReduce framework. It offers data analytics, machine learning-based forecasting, and energy trend insights in a fully modular setup utilising Hadoop, MapReduce, Apache Spark complementing the Streamlit UI.
Small classic machine learning framework written in C++

A hybrid machine learning framework for river discharge forecasting that combines ensemble regression models with the Arithmetic Optimization Algorithm (AOA) for hyperparameter tuning and next-day flow prediction.
A machine learning framework for stock price movement prediction that integrates social media sentiment with traditional market indicators to improve the reliability of short-term forecasts.
A robust, RFC-compliant HTTP server built from scratch in Pythonno frameworks, fully extensible for machine learning and fintech APIs.
Translation exploration with Transformers and Machine Learning Experimentation Platfroms

Machine learning framework integrating clinical, laboratory, and genomic (SNP) data to predict the presence and severity of coronary artery disease (CAD) via the GEnetic SYNTAX Score (GESS) model. Enhances CAD risk stratification and supports precision cardiovascular medicine.
Building a simple deep learning framework and some machine learning/deep learning models from scratch (pure Numpy and Pytorch)
This repository contains the code and analysis for a quantitative research project aimed at empirically validating the Fama-French asset pricing framework using modern machine learning techniques.
DIfferentiable MOlecular Simulator (DIMOS): A pyTorch based framework for machine-learning enhanced simulations
Anvil is a Rust-based machine learning framework designed to combine the performance of low-level linear algebra with the ease of high-level ML APIs.
Photonic Quantum Machine Learning Framework
Machine-Learning Driven Auto-Scaling DataUtility Framework Empowers Scalable, Secure, and Decentralized Data Analytics
XGBoost-based machine learning framework to predict VM CPU demand in cloud data centers using Google Cluster Trace data, with SHAP analysis for model interpretability.

This project implements a machine learning-based Digital Twin framework for the battery recycling industry. It integrates data from recycled battery bags and blackmass chemical analysis to simulate, predict, and optimize the recycling process.

Type 2diabetes (T2D) is a chronic metabolic disorder affecting millions globally,  influenced by genetics, lifestyle, and comorbidities.an interpretable machine learning framework that leverages  electronic health records (EHR) and patient feedback to identify individual risk  factors for T2D and generate tailored lifestyle recommendations
Automatic quantification and classification of geometric distortion in prostate diffusion-weighted MRI using an ensemble machine learning framework.

This framework demonstrates advanced machine learning techniques including: - Deep learning models for sequential test pattern recognition - Real GitHub API integration for authentic data collection - Ensemble methods with statistical significance testing - Time-series analysis for temporal test behaviour patterns

A machine learning project that applies Vis-NIR spectral data to predict key plant nutrients using ensemble models within a stacked learning framework. This work demonstrates how data-driven methods can enhance agricultural productivity through scalable nutrient estimation.

Research and implementation of optimal transport methods in financial modeling. Explores risk-neutral measure learning, calibration, and pricing through geometric and probabilistic frameworks, linking advanced mathematics, machine learning, and modern asset valuation theory.
Tensor library & inference framework for machine learning
